defaultString: Select to perform a special attack.

params.1377: Rampage: Drain your Attack, Defence, Ranged & Magic levels by 10%, while increasing your Strength by 10 levels, plus 25% of the drained levels.

params.8872: Backstab: Deal an attack with greatly increased accuracy on unsuspecting targets and that lowers your target's Defence level by the damage dealt.
params.8874: Backstab: Deal an attack with greatly increased accuracy on unsuspecting targets and that lowers your target's Defence level by the damage dealt.

params.35: Sanctuary: Temporarily increase your Defence level by 8.
params.1305: Cleave: Deal a powerful attack that inflicts 15% more damage.
params.4587: Sever: Deal a slash with increased accuracy that prevents your target from using protection prayers for 5 seconds if it successfully hits.
params.20000: Sever: Deal a slash with increased accuracy that prevents your target from using protection prayers for 5 seconds if it successfully hits.
params.6746: Weaken: Temporarily drain your target's Attack, Strength and Defence by 5%. Is twice as effective against demons.
params.19675: Weaken: Temporarily drain your target's Attack, Strength and Defence by 5%. Is twice as effective against demons.
params.11037: Liquify: Deal an attack with double the chance of hitting that boosts your Strength, Attack and Defence levels by 25% of the damage dealt. Can only be used underwater.
params.7158: Powerstab: Hit up to fourteen enemies surrounding you.
params.11802: The Judgement: Deal an attack that inflicts 37.5% more damage with double accuracy.
params.20368: The Judgement: Deal an attack that inflicts 37.5% more damage with double accuracy.
params.11804: Warstrike: Deal an attack, with double accuracy, that inflicts 21% more damage and drains one of your target's combat stats by the damage dealt.
params.20370: Warstrike: Deal an attack, with double accuracy, that inflicts 21% more damage and drains one of your target's combat stats by the damage dealt.
params.11806: Healing Blade: Deal an attack that inflicts 10% more damage with double accuracy, while restoring your Hitpoints and Prayer by 50% and 25% of the damage dealt respectively.
params.20372: Healing Blade: Deal an attack that inflicts 10% more damage with double accuracy, while restoring your Hitpoints and Prayer by 50% and 25% of the damage dealt respectively.
params.11808: Ice Cleave: Deal an attack that inflicts 10% more damage with double accuracy and freezes your target for 20 seconds if it successfully hits.
params.20374: Ice Cleave: Deal an attack that inflicts 10% more damage with double accuracy and freezes your target for 20 seconds if it successfully hits.
params.26233: Blood Sacrifice: Deal an attack that inflicts 10% more damage with double accuracy and marks your target for a blood sacrifice. Targets marked for a blood sacrifice will be hit for 25 damage after a short delay, unless they move away. If they are hit, you'll also be healed for the damage dealt.
params.11838: Saradomin's Lightning: Call upon Saradomin's power to perform an attack that inflicts 10% more melee damage and 1-16 extra magic damage.
params.12808: Saradomin's Lightning: Call upon Saradomin's power to perform an attack with 25% higher max hit.
params.12809: Saradomin's Lightning: Call upon Saradomin's power to perform an attack with 25% higher max hit.
params.1434: Shatter: Increase damage by 50% and accuracy by 25% for one hit.
params.10887: Sunder: Deal an attack with double accuracy and 10% higher max hit. Lowers your target's Attack, Defence, Ranged or Magic level by 10% of the damage dealt.
params.11061: Favour of the War God: Deal an attack which hits through Protect from Melee and siphons Prayer points equal to the damage dealt.
params.3101: Impale: Deal an attack with 10% increased Attack and Strength, but with a slower speed.
params.4153: Quick Smash: Deal an extra attack instantly.

params.3204: Sweep: If your target is small, adjacent targets may be hit too. Otherwise, your target may be hit a second time, with 25% decreased accuracy. Damage in all cases is increased by 10% of your max hit.

params.22516: Pulsate: Fire an incredibly powerful burst of energy.
params.22634: Hamstring: Deal a minimum of 20% extra damage and hamstring player targets, causing them to lose run energy 6x faster for 1 minute.
params.22636: Phantom Strike: This does nothing vs non-player targets. As well as dealing a regular attack, your target will suffer that damage again over time.
params.22622: Smash: Deal an attack which deals a minimum of 25% extra damage and lowers your target's Defence level by 30%.
params.22613: Feint: Deal an attack which treats your target's defence as if it was reduced by 75%. It will deal a minimum of 20% extra damage.
params.24617: Feint: Deal an attack which treats your target's defence as if it was reduced by 75%. It will deal a minimum of 20% extra damage.
params.22610: Spear Wall: All damage dealt by this attack is reduced by 50%, but will damage up to sixteen targets surrounding you. After using this attack, you will be immune from melee attacks for 5 seconds.

params.24424: Immolate: Fire a powerful spell with 50% improved accuracy. Damage scales based upon magic level and can be increased with magic damage boosting equipment. Costs no runes to use.
params.24425: Invocate: Fire a powerful spell that restores your prayer points by 50% of the damage dealt. Damage scales based upon magic level and can be increased with magic damage boosting equipment. Your prayer points can go above your level, to a maximum of 120. Costs no runes to use.
params.25517: Immolate: Fire a powerful spell with 50% improved accuracy. Damage scales based upon magic level and can be increased with magic damage boosting equipment. Costs no runes to use.
params.26219: Eviscerate: Perform an attack with your true maximum hit and a 50% accuracy bonus.
params.26374: Evoke: Perform an attack with double accuracy, with a guaranteed enchanted bolt activation rate on successful hit.
